WorkItem.Description:
Possibility for setting Approval back to inherited (WSUS calls this "Same as Parent") would be nice.

Great Work! We are using it for Rollout-Management of local published packages.
WorkItem.Summary: Possibility for setting Approval back to inherited

Comments.Message:
Hi seitfa, unfortunately I can't see any options to do that in Wsus. 
Only things I can do are :
- Approve for Installation.
- Approve for Uninstallation
- Approve for Installation with a deadline.
- Set Not Approved
- Decline

I can't see any inheritance notions in the Wsus API.
